mapper.select:
select nvl(sum(c.class_credit),0) from classreg cr, class c where cr.std_no = #{std_no} and cr.class_no = c.class_no
and c.class_type = #{classtype}

select rn, classreg_no, class_no, class_name, std_level, std_semester, class_type, class_credit, pro_no, pro_name, class_dayofweek, class_time, classreg_retake from (select rownum rn, a.classreg_no, a.class_no, class_name, std_level, std_semester, class_type, class_credit, c.pro_no, pro_name, class_dayofweek, class_time, classreg_retake from( select * from classreg where to_char(classreg_date,'YYYYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') and std_no = #{std_no} order by classreg_no desc) a, student s, professor p, class c where a.std_no = s.std_no and a.class_no=c.class_no and c.pro_no=p.pro_no order by rn desc) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select nvl(count(*),0) from classreg where std_no =#{std_no} and to_char(classreg_date,'YYYYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD')
select nvl(sum(class_credit),0) from classreg c, class c1 where c.std_no=#{std_no} and c.class_no = c1.class_no and to_char(classreg_date, 'YYYYMMDD') >= to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD')

insert into classreg ( classreg_no, classreg_date, classreg_level, classreg_semester, classreg_retake, std_no, class_no ) values( #{classreg_no}, sysdate, #{classreg_level}, #{classreg_semester}, #{classreg_retake}, #{std_no}, #{class_no} )
select nvl(count(*),0) from classreg where std_no =#{std_no} and class_no=#{class_no} and to_char(classreg_date, 'YYYYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD')
select nvl(count(*),0) from classreg where std_no =#{std_no} and class_no=#{class_no}
delete classreg where classreg_no=#{classreg_no} and std_no=#{std_no}
